Garmin

I've built a watch-face for my watch and made it public. A watch-face is the view you see when your GPS watch is in normal mode. It displays the time, the battery level, the date, a Bluetooth icon (if connected) and your daily steps. The code is open-source and hosted here. A nice remake has been made and hosted here. The watch-face is available for download at Garmin Connect IQ.
Number of downloads: 5089 (March 2018)
Screenshot
The orange bar indicate the number of daily steps compared to the daily steps goal. The color can be modified.

Number of downloads in the last months
